message.empty: Đ_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________ớ?
message.mustBeEmpty: Đ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________ớ.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: Đ_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________ớ?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: Đ_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items_________________________________________________________________________________ớ?
message.cannotBeDeleted: Đ_The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted___________________________________________________________ớ.
